item.description:
The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup is sponsoring its first-ever charity fundraiser in the six years of its existence. The beneficiary is the Eduardo Zabala II Memorial Fund at Rhode Island College. Ed, a RIC student, was tragically killed in a car accident on Feb 26, 2011, and his sisters Carissa and Valerie who have long been members of the Sushi Meetup are establishing a fund to assist students in need, especially those from non-traditional backgrounds such as transferring from community college.

Feel free to drop in anytime between 1:00pm and 5:00pm and stay as long as you like. Of course, the longer you stay, the more fun you can have. For those at least 21, the restaurant offers a full service bar.

THE TICKET YOU BUY IS FOR ADMISSION ONLY, OF WHICH 100% WILL GO TO THE MEMORIAL FUND. ALL PURCHASES OF FOOD AND BEVERAGES AT THE EVENT WILL BE OPTIONAL AND SEPARATE TRANSACTIONS BETWEEN ATTENDEES AND THE RESTAURANT.

We would love to have you join us for sushi, but we understand if you are buying a ticket to support this effort in Ed's memory and will not actually be able to attend.

You can purchase tickets through Brown Paper Tickets using a major credit or debit card (Visa, MasterCard, Discover, American Express, Maestro, and Solo) with a $1.69 service charge:
Web: http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/172115
Telephone (toll-free!): +1 (800) 838 3006 — event code 172115

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Eduardo Zabala II Memorial Fund - sushi fundraiser
